top.title: Welcome to Looky
top.description: The perfect outfit for you today

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.success: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
signup.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

login.title: Log In
login.description: Let's log in to your account.
login.success: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
login.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

verify.title: Verification
verify.do_not_receive_code: Did not receive the verification code?
verify.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

tab1.title: Try On Clothes in Your Photos
tab1.description: No need to physically wear clothes; easily try on various outfits.

tab2.title: Curate Your Style with Swipes
tab2.description: Swipe left or right to discover more clothes that match your preferences.

tab3.title: Find Clothes That Suit You
tab3.description: Experiment a lot and find outfits you love.

name.title: Enter your name
name.description: This name will be visible to other users. You can change it later.
name.label: Username
name.too_short_name: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
name.too_long_name: Username must be 24 characters or less.

gender.title: Select your gender
gender.description: This will be used to recommend clothing. You can change it later.
gender.label: Gender

avatar.title: Choose an avatar
avatar.description: This avatar will be visible to other users. You can change it later.
avatar.label: Avatar
avatar.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

intro.title: Upload yourr Full-Body Photo
intro.description: This full-body photo of you to try on clothes.
intro.note: You can change the photo later.

tab1.title: Use a simple background
tab1.description: Try to take the photo in front of a simple, uncluttered background.

tab2.title: Stay within the frame
tab2.description: Make sure your entire body fits within the on-screen frame.

tab3.title: Use the self-timer
tab3.description: Set up your phone and use the self-timer to take the photo.

guide.error: Camera access is not allowed. Please allow camera access in your settings.

confirm.title: Are you satisfied with this photo?
confirm.requirement1: Your entire body fits within the frame.
confirm.requirement2: You are facing the camera directly.
confirm.requirement3: No other people or objects are visible in the background.
confirm.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

placeholder.title: Camera Access Required
placeholder.description: Camera access is not allowed. Please click the button below to enable it.
